1.0.2.en: Appstore compatibility changes. Minor translation updates. Updated P1 icon.

1.0.3.en: Sessy and P1 firmware information and flow card added. Homey forced control mode extended to every control attempt. Readme updated.

1.0.4.en: Sessy Dongle and Battery firmware information, flow cards and timeline added. New available firmware now only triggers once after app start.

1.0.5.en: Sessy Dongle and Battery firmware information, flow cards and timeline added. New available firmware now only triggers once after app start.

1.0.6.en: Added settings for minimum and maximum Sessy power. Auto stop charging/discharging when battery is full/empty. Max discharge limit set to 1.8kW.

1.0.7.en: Added frequency info. Added full/empty detection based on system state.

1.0.8.en: Added seperate settings for max charge/discharge limits.

1.0.9.en: Fixed compatibility with Sessy fw1.5.0. Stability improvements.

2.0.0.en: Improved pairing UX. Use mDNS device discovery and IP update. Added dongle reboot command. Added extended P1 info (fw1.5.2). Added set SESSY XOM.

2.0.1.en: Improved error message when using old firmware. Improved device naming when pairing. Added firmware level info to P1.

2.0.2.en: Added system state details to flow triggercard. Fix P1 wrong username/password restarts.

2.1.0.en: Added CT meter support. Ignore case for username and password.

2.1.2.en: Added CT meter type selection for Homey Energy. Increased decimals for current (A) to 3.

2.1.3.en: Disabled 'force homey control' by default. Extended control mode explaination during pairing. Improved pairing for non-mDNS networks.

2.2.0.en: Added support for Sessy Connect mode. Added eco charge and eco discharge modes.

2.2.1.en: Added support for Sessy ECO mode.

2.3.0.en: Added flow cards for system settings (noise level, min power, max power).

2.4.0.en: Added kWh meters for Sessy and CT meter (fw>=1.7.2). Added slider UI for system noise level.

2.4.1.en: New slider UI and flow cards for system noise level.

2.5.0.en: Added Homey total imported/exported energy capability. Added Sessy inverter current capability (fw>=1.8.1). API discovery endpoints update.

2.7.0.en: AI translation to all languages. CT meter: Added option for correction of low power measurements.
